name: Coloristic Art
description:
It’s time to relax and color with the best adult coloring book application available in the App Store! Coloristic Art offers beautiful, unique, one-of-a-kind designs in your favorite coloring book categories such as animals, mandalas, patterns, cats, gardens, floral, people, places, and much more!
Drawing and coloring your favorite pictures has never been more enjoyable!

Features:
- Huge Library of Pictures to Paint: Animals, mandalas, patterns, cats, gardens, floral, people, places, and more!
- New Pictures: We release new images all the time!
- Easy to Color: Choose your color palette and tap to color
- Built in Gradients: No need to be an expert artist. Every image we have contains built in gradients that produce a beautiful design
- Offline Mode: Paint pictures you have already started to color offline. No wifi needed!
- Optimized App: Never deal with lag or glitches in this smooth, easy-to-use, no lag app!

Coloristic Art makes a master artist out of anyone. Take yourself into a magical world of color and enjoy our calm, fun, coloring application to express the artist within you!
You might have used Happy Color, Colorfy, Color Planet, Paint by Number, Color by Number, or Recolor before, but you’ve never experienced the magic of the built-in gradients and special tools offered by Coloristic Art.

Thank you for considering Coloristic Art coloring book app. We think you will find this app superior to Happy Color, Colorfy, Color Planet, Paint by Number, Color by Number, Recolor, or one of the many other apps available in the iTunes app store. Happy coloring!
